name: Machine Head
overview: See through the eyes of Dr Kimberly Stride as you ride the Vorpal Blade through an insane combination of shoot-em-up action, strategic objectives and B-movie melodrama. Gasp with amazement at state-of-the-art virtual landscapes, tunnel systems and eye-popping FMV. Laugh in the face of danger as you blast through fifteen adrenaline-pumping stages of sheer 3D exhilaration. Scream with terror at horrific hordes of mutated polygonal enemies. Beg for mercy as you face the Machinehead in the mother of all showdowns!
